mapper.sql: id, className, requestMethod, contentType, requestParams, requestType, serverAddr, remoteAddr, deviceName, browserName, userAgent, requestUri, requestTime
mapper.insert: insert into hrm.accessLog (className, requestMethod, contentType, requestParams, requestType, serverAddr, remoteAddr, deviceName, browserName, userAgent, requestUri, requestTime ) values (#{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestParams,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{requestType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serverAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remoteAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{browserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestUri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestTime,jdbcType=DATE} )

requestUri = #{accessLog.requestUri,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and e.beginDate between #{beginDateScope[0]} and #{beginDateScope[1]}
